page.title: 15TUXFORD problems 3
page.content:
too fast along the avenues and someone can get badly hurt. They also ride about on their bikes late at night when people are in bed.
{THE PARK IN TUXFORD (E74.2/7O.6N)
The park near my house has a few dangerous things, there was a see-saw and a few weeks ago when I went there they had taken the part which you sit on off, and it just had the bottom on and it was sharp. I like the logs which they made into things you can climb on. I think that people who go there should take more care of the things we have to play on. Some people don't appreciate them because there are only the bars left for the swings and somebody could easily get hurt.
